text: Mohammed Yahiya Azeez (; born 9 May 1997 Erbil) is an Iraqi Kurdish writer and lawyer, and representative of Kurdish Students at Al-Azhar University to the Ministry of Endowments and Religious Affairs of the Kurdistan Regional Government of Iraq. He graduated from the Faculty of Sharia and Law at Al- Azhar University in Egypt in 2021, and represented the Ministry of Endowments and Religious Affairs in the Kurdistan Regional Government of Iraq and participated as a member of the delegation in Egypt. Azeez is a member of the Iraqi Kurdistan Bar Association since 2022. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Kurdish writers Category:Iraqi writers Category:Iraqi lawyers Category:Iraqi Muslims Category:Iraqi Kurdistan
title: Mohammed Yahiya Azeez
